DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Efficacy Safety 'INNOCELL Immuncell-LC ' With Temozolomide Newly Diagnosed Glioblastoma Korea
DOC.detailed_description: < Primary Purpose > Compare clinical efficacy group treat cell theraputic INNOCELL Immuncell-LC evaluate progression free survival untreated group . < Secondary Purpose > Compare clinical efficacy group treat INNOCELL Immuncell-LC , drug treat glioblastoma evaluate overall survival , therapy reaction , EORTC QLQ-C30 , Karnofsky Performance Status ( KPS ) untreated group , evaluate adverse reaction , clinical pathological test , safety .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients , prior study , receive explanation purpose content study characteristic test drug test administrator consent study provide signature self , guardian , legal representative . 2 . Patients 18 70 year age 3 . Patients whose cause cancer find glioblastoma via pathological test 4. patient receive surgery glioblastoma ( Complete partial extirpation biopsy ) 2 week prior study 5 . Patients whose survival expect longer 3 month 6 . Patients whose KPS great 60 7 . Patients satisfy follow condition blood test , kidney function test , liver function test Hemoglobin big 10 gm % Platelet Count big 100,000/µL Absolute granulocyte count big 1,500/µL BUN Creatinine 1.5 x upper normal limit Bilirubin level small 2.0 mg/dL SGOT , SGPT , alkaline phosphatase small 1.5 x upper normal limit 1 . Patients determine serious Cardio Pulmonary function disability clinical study staff 2 . Patients immune deficient history auto immune disease ( Ex . Rheumatoid Arthritis , Systemic Lupus Erythematosus , Vasculitis , Multiple sclerosis , Adolescent InsulinDependent Diabetes Mellitus , etc . ) 3 . Patients history malignant tumor recent 5 year prior study exception skin cancer , local prostate cancer , cervical cancer . 4 . Patients history severe allergies 5 . Patients serious mental illness 6 . Patients pregnant nursing 7 . Patients participate clinical test recent 4 week prior study
